description: Orchestrates complete compliance workflow including rule extraction, validation, and remediation recommendations
test_message_used: Process this request and coordinate sub-agents
raw_test_response:
To begin the compliance check workflow, I need you to provide the following:

1. The Investment Guideline document (preferably as a PDF file).
2. The portfolio holdings data to be validated (CSV, Excel, or clearly structured data).

Please upload or describe these documents so I can start the process by orchestrating the Rule Extraction Agent.
